instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: Early 2013 15" A1398 Freezes on startup before showing login screen
threads.message: Hello!, i have MB pro 820-3332-A which started firstly panicking, after i had no image so U8900 was replaced and now there is image but machine freezes on startup and i can see keyboard lights up, caps lock light works, even sound but image is stil stuckl on apple logo. When closing lid backlight still on. Tried to clean ME with CH341A, haven't helped. And noticed after ASD machine boots fine, but works only for 20-30min until gets kernel panic and after restart same thing. Thank you for support! :)

threads.title: Early 2013 15" A1398 Freezes on startup before showing login screen
threads.message:
No Title

Got a log. Looks like GPU issue?, same U8900 causing problems?

threads.title: Early 2013 15" A1398 Freezes on startup before showing login screen
threads.message:
Reflow GMUX.
If doesn't help, I suppose you have GPU issue...

threads.title: Early 2013 15" A1398 Freezes on startup before showing login screen
threads.message: Could be GMUX could be VRAM. Any damage to the fan screw hole on the right side of the board?

threads.title: Early 2013 15" A1398 Freezes on startup before showing login screen
threads.message:
No Title

Sorry, might sound a bit stupid, but where exactly GMUX IC are located or named on schematics, can't find info about that one? Actually i did find, that screwhole is a little bit damaged.

threads.title: Early 2013 15" A1398 Freezes on startup before showing login screen
threads.message:
i would try another U8900. you might have used a bad U8900.

this is the mux chip.
